questions.question: A good way to make sure you stay alert when driving is to:
questions.explaination: The correct answer is d.  It is best to both wait until a time when you can be sure you are alert and make sure any medications you are taking do not cause drowsiness.

questions.question: Taking a prescription medication that has not been prescribed to you before operating a motor vehicle is safe as long as:

questions.question: Driving carelessly can lead to the following:
questions.explaination: The correct answer is a.  It is true that the action of lightly pressing the gas pedal and brake pedal simultaneously will dry your brakes.
